tsp

Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsp.Population

  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    A Population is used to hold the VertexSet as well as all the paths. It is the population which will be evolved and thus new paths can be developed. All the genetic algorithm stuff is also included in this class.
    Author:
    Roman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Population(VertexSet vs, int size, double nMutationRate)
      constructor I, used to initiate a population

      Method used to get detailed information about a population in form of a multiline string.
      Path getFittestPath()
      Determines the fittest path in the population by looking for the highest fitness and returns a clone of it.

      Method used to get information about a population in form of a one line string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Population

        public Population(VertexSet vs,
                  int size,
                  double nMutationRate)
        constructor I, used to initiate a population
        Parameters:
        vs - VertexSet on which the population should be based on
        size - number of paths created
        nMutationRate - value between 0 and 1 indicating the intensity of mutation being applied

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomPath

        public Path getRandomPath()
        Returns a Path whit a randomly defined order of how to travel the vertices.
        Returns:
        a randomly defined Path

      • getFittestPath

        public Path getFittestPath()
        Determines the fittest path in the population by looking for the highest fitness and returns a clone of it.
        Returns:
        a clone of the fittest path

      • evolve

        @Deprecated
public void evolve()
        Deprecated. 
        Method I used to evolve the population one generation further. Parent paths are being picked more or less randomly accordingly to their fitness.

      • evolve2

        public void evolve2()
        Method II used to evolve the population one generation further. The two fittest paths will be the only two parent paths for all child paths of the next generation.

      • getDetailedInfo

        public java.lang.String getDetailedInfo()
        Method used to get detailed information about a population in form of a multiline string.
        Returns:
        Accumulates the info string of each path stored in this population retrieved by the Path-method .getInfo().

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Method used to get information about a population in form of a one line string.
        Returns:
        the populations generation number and the current lowest distance achieved by the population's current fittest path as a one line info string
